Disillusioned with the corporate world, I quit my job in April 2016 to trade sports full time.

Why sports trading?

I really love the freedom associated with it - I am answerable to noone and am able to do things my own way.

I realise that I am not a very good trader at this stage and I have a long way to go. My blog will document my journey from a novice trader to hopefully a successful one. I have given myself 3 years to crack this and I would like my new career to start paying my monthly bills by April-2017.

Growing up I played and watched quite a bit of cricket. Also with a proliferation of liquidity in these markets from Asia, I think cricket trading is the way to go for me.

I have a degree in Computer Science. I really enjoy programming and I will attempt to write my own software applications to help me trade.
